title: Lakshmi Kasu Golusu Bangles - Dazzling Diamond & Gold Kada Set
materials: Brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) simulating diamonds. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Crafted in a classic Kada style, these bangles feature meticulously placed, individually prong-set CZ stones along the entirety of the bangle. The design showcases a timeless appeal, reminiscent of vintage Lakshmi Kasu designs with a modern twist. The open ends are crafted for easy wear.
occasions: or any special celebration where you want to showcase a touch of traditional elegance.
description: These bangles combine traditional design elements with modern sparkle. The high-quality CZ stones offer a diamond-like brilliance at an accessible price point. Crafted with durability in mind, these bangles are designed to be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and resistance to wear. A perfect balance of heritage and contemporary style.
